name: Beautiful Gravity
description:
*Warning* Read before downloading.

Game includes graphic content including incest, pedophilia, rape, and torture. While all of these are not explicitly explained, or depicted graphically, they are inferred. People who find this material particularly upsetting should tread lightly, or not read at all.

At the edge of a cliff, the beautiful auburn haired girl looks out onto the sea, begging the gravity to take away her pain. Guide her through her final moments, and explore this girls life as she has to decide between salvation or perserverence.
